and front end web developer MS Web Technologies BDes Visual Communication Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Graphic Designer and Front End Developer Healthcasts LLC New York NY March 2017 to Present Graphic designer and front end web developer in the Healthcasts Media production department This role focuses on pharmaceutical advertising to healthcare professionals Designing and developing responsive websites from concept to completion creating high fidelity mockups with InDesign and Photoshop for desktop tablet and phone then coding these sites with HTML CSS and jQuery adding tracking for analytics and launching these programs on the Healthcasts platform Designing and developing emails that drive to these programs and print pieces such as marketing mailers Originally hired as a graphic designer in a fastpaced production environment Worked crossfunctionally between teams spanning design development and editorial I leveraged my knowledge of both design and development to take on a hybrid role with a high level of responsibility taking ownership of new program builds from mockups to launch Additional responsibilities project management conducting calls with clients advising the client services department on specifics for new builds and custom designsfunctionality conducting interviews with potential hires training team members and new hires Significant achievements In 2018 our team launched a record number of programs achieving the highest number of program launches in the companys 17 year history In 2019 our team beat the 2018 record in monetary value Communications Assistant Seeds of Peace New York NY January 2016 to October 2016 Assisting with launch of new website Graphic design with InDesign and Photoshop responsive web development with HTML and CSS on the WordPress platform Usability testing website optimization debugging content creation content management This was a temporary role as I was working in the US on a J1 visa before receiving my green card Significant achievement I was offered a permanent fulltime position at the end of my J1 with this company due to excellent work performance Front End Developer and Designer Bourbonfm Dublin October 2014 to October 2015 Graphic design and full stack web development for a music and ecommercefocused tech startup User Interface and User Experience design
